product_name: SmartWool NTS Light 195 Printed Zip-T Long Underwear Top - Women's
long_description: Adorned with a pretty screen print on the sleeves, the women's SmartWool NTS Light 195 Printed Zip-T long underwear top makes your favorite cool-weather activities more comfortable. Lightweight merino wool helps maintain a comfortable temperature by wicking moisture away from skin, drying quickly and offering light insulation. Fabric protects skin from harsh UV light with a UPF rating of 35. Breathe easy after a long day of activity thanks to the natural odor resistance of merino wool. 7.8 in. front zipper ventilates instantly and protects skin with a zipper guard. Unlike traditional wool, SmartWool items do not itch and can be repeatedly washed and dried without shrinking. Sculpted side panels eliminate side seams for reduced chafing and a body-enhancing fit, and chafe-free flatlock seams enhance comfort. Contoured sleeve cuffs and droptail bottom hem increase coverage. The women's SmartWool NTS Light 195 Zip-T long underwear top features a heat transfer logo at left sleeve cuff.
short_description: Adorned with a pretty screen print on the sleeves, the women's SmartWool NTS Light 195 Printed Zip-T long underwear top makes your favorite cool-weather activities more comfortable.
